Card.Name: Copper
Card.Description: +1 Coins

Card.Name: Silver
Card.Description: +2 Coins

Card.Name: Gold
Card.Description: +3 Coins

Card.Name: Estate
Card.Description: +1 Victory Points

Card.Name: Duchy
Card.Description: +3 Victory Points

Card.Name: Province
Card.Description: +6 Victory Points

Card.Name: Curse
Card.Description: -1 Victory Points

Card.Name: Cellar
Card.Description: +1 Action. Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded

Card.Name: Chapel
Card.Description: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.

Card.Name: Moat
Card.Description: +2 Cards. When another player plays an Attach card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, you are unaffected by that Attack.

Card.Name: Chancellor
Card.Description: +2 Coins. You may immediately put your deck into your discard pile.

Card.Name: Village
Card.Description: +1 Card. +2 Actions

Card.Name: Woodcutter
Card.Description: +1 Buy. +2 Coins

Card.Name: Workshop
Card.Description: +1 Buy. +2 Coins

Card.Name: Bureaucrat
Card.Description: Gain a silver card; put it on top of your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from his hand and puts it on his deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).

Card.Name: Feast
Card.Description: Trash this card. Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins.

Card.Name: Gardens
Card.Description: Worth 1 Victory for every 10 cards in your deck (rounded down).

Card.Name: Militia
Card.Description: +2 Coins. Each other player discards down to 3 cards in his hand.

Card.Name: Moneylender
Card.Description: Trash a Copper from your hand. If you do, +3 Coins

Card.Name: Remodel
Card.Description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 2 Coins more than the trashed card.

Card.Name: Smithy
Card.Description: +3 Cards

Card.Name: Spy
Card.Description: +1 Card. +1 Action. Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice.

Card.Name: Thief
Card.Description: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck. If they revealed any Treasure cards, they trash one of them that you choose. You may gain any or all of these trashed cards. They discard the other revealed cards.

Card.Name: Throne Room
Card.Description: Choose an Action card in your hand. Play it twice.

Card.Name: Council Room
Card.Description: +4 Cards. +1 Buy. Each other player draws a card.

Card.Name: Festival
Card.Description: +2 Actions. +1 Buy. +2 Coins

Card.Name: Laboratory
Card.Description: +2 Cards. +1 Action

Card.Name: Library
Card.Description: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand. You may set aside any Action cards drawn this way, as you draw them; discard the set aside cards after you finish drawing.

Card.Name: Market
Card.Description: +1 Card. +1 Action. +1 Buy. +1 Coin.

Card.Name: Mine
Card.Description: Trash a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a Treasure card costing up to 3 Coins more; put it into your hand.

Card.Name: Witch
Card.Description: +2 Cards. Each other player gains a Curse card.

Card.Name: Adventurer
Card.Description: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Treasure cards in your hand and discard the other revealed cards.

Card.Name: Courtyard
Card.Description: +3 Cards. Put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Pawn
Card.Description: Choose two: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Buy; +1 Coin. (The choices must be different.)

Card.Name: Secret Chamber
Card.Description: Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded. When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, +2 cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Great Hall
Card.Description: +1 Victory Point. +1 Card. +1 Action

Card.Name: Masquerade
Card.Description: +2 Cards. Each player passes a card in their hand to the player on their left. You may trash a card from your hand.

Card.Name: Shanty Town
Card.Description: +2 Actions. Reveal your hand. If you have no Action cards in hand, +2 Cards.

Card.Name: Steward
Card.Description: Choose one: +2 Cards; or +2 Coins; or trash 2 cards from your hand.

Card.Name: Swindler
Card.Description: +2 Coins. Each other player trashes the top card of his deck and gains a card with the same cost that you choose.

Card.Name: Wishing Well
Card.Description: +1 Buy. You may discard an Estate card. If you do, +4 Coins. Otherwise, gain an Estate card.

Card.Name: Baron
Card.Description: +1 Buy. You may discard an Estate card. If you do, +4 Coins. Otherwise, gain an Estate card.

Card.Name: Bridge
Card.Description: +1 Buy; +1 Coins; All cards (including cards in players' hands) cost 1 Coin less this turn, but not less than 0 Coins.

Card.Name: Conspirator
Card.Description: +2 Coins. If you've played 3 or more Actions this turn (counting this): +1 Card; +1 Action.

Card.Name: Coppersmith
Card.Description: Copper produces an extra +1 Coin this turn.

Card.Name: Ironworks
Card.Description: Gain a card costin up to 4 Coins. If it is an. . . Action card, +1 Action. Treasure Card, +1 Coin. Victory card, +1 Card.

Card.Name: Mining Village
Card.Description: +1 Card; +2 Actions. You may trash this card immediately. If you do, +2 Coins

Card.Name: Scout
Card.Description: +1 Action. Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Victory cards into your hand. Put the other cards on top of you deck in any order.

Card.Name: Duke
Card.Description: Worth 1 Victory Point per Duchy you have.

Card.Name: Minion
Card.Description: +1 Action. Choose one: +2 Coins; or discard your hand, +4 Cards, and each other player with at least 5 cards in hand discards his hand and draws 4 cards.

Card.Name: Saboteur
Card.Description: Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until revealing one costing 3 Coins or more. He trashes that cards and may gain a card costing at most 2 Coins less than it. He discards the other revealed cards.

Card.Name: Torturer
Card.Description: +3 Cards. Each other player chooses one: he discards 2 cards; or he gains a Curse card, putting it in his hand.

Card.Name: Trading Post
Card.Description: Trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, gain a silver card; put it into your hand.

Card.Name: Tribute
Card.Description: The player to your left reveals then discards the top 2 cards of his deck. For each differently named card revealed, if it is an. . . Action card, +2 Actions; Treasure card, +2 Coins; Victory card, +2 Cards.

Card.Name: Upgrade
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Action. Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 more coin than it.

Card.Name: Harem
Card.Description: Worth 2 Victory points

Card.Name: Nobles
Card.Description: 2 Victory points. Choose one: +3 Cards; or +2 Actions.

Card.Name: Embargo
Card.Description: +2 Coins. Trash this card. Put an Embargo token on top of a Supply pile. When a player buys a card, he gains a Curse card per Embargo token on that pile.

Card.Name: Haven
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Action. Set aside a card from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.

Card.Name: Lighthouse
Card.Description: +1 Action. Now and at the start of your next turn; +1 Coin. While this is in play, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn't affect you.

Card.Name: Native Village
Card.Description: +2 Actions. Choose one: Set aside the top card of your deck face down on your Native Village mat; or put all the cards from your mat into your hand. You may look at the cards on your mat at any time; return them to your deck at the end of the game.

Card.Name: Pearl Diver
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Action. Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may put it on top.

Card.Name: Ambassador
Card.Description: +2 Actions, +1 Coin. At the start of your next turn: +1 Action; +1 Coin

Card.Name: Fishing Village
Card.Description: +2 Action; +1 Coin. At the start of your next turn: +1 Action; +1 Coin

Card.Name: Lookout
Card.Description: +1 Action. Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash one of them. Discard one of them. Put the other one on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Smugglers
Card.Description: Gain a copy of a card costing up to 6 Coins that the player to your right gained on his last turn.

Card.Name: Warehouse
Card.Description: +3 Cards; +1 Action. At the start of your next turn, +1 Card.

Card.Name: Caravan
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Action. At the start of your next turn, +1 Card.

Card.Name: Cutpurse
Card.Description: +2 Coins. Each other player discards a Copper card (or reveals a hand with no Copper).

Card.Name: Island
Card.Description: Set aside this and another card from your hand. Return them to your deck at the end of the game. Worth 2 Victory Points.

Card.Name: Navigator
Card.Description: +2 Coins. Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Either discard all of them, or put them back on top of your deck in any order.

Card.Name: Pirate Ship
Card.Description: Choose one: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Treasure that you choose, discards the rest, and if anyone trashed a Treasure you take a Coin token; or, +1 Coin per Coin token you've taken with Pirate Ships this game.

Card.Name: Salvager
Card.Description: +1 Buy. Trash a card from your hand. +Coins equal to its cost.

Card.Name: Sea Hag
Card.Description: Each other player discards the top card of his deck, then gains a Curse card, putting it on top of his deck.

Card.Name: Treasure Map
Card.Description: Trash this and another copy of Treasure Map from your hand. If you do trash two Treasure Maps, gain 4 Gold cards, putting them on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Bazaar
Card.Description: +1 Card; +2 Actions, +1 Coin

Card.Name: Explorer
Card.Description: You may reveal a Province card from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold card, putting it into your hand. Otherwise, gain a Silver card, putting it into your hand.

Card.Name: Ghost Ship
Card.Description: +2 Cards. Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand puts cards from his hand puts cards from his hand on top of his deck until he has 3 cards in his hand.

Card.Name: Merchant Ship
Card.Description: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Coins

Card.Name: Outpost
Card.Description: You only draw 3 cards (instead of 5) in this turn's Clean-up phase. Take an extra turn after this one. This can't cause you to take more than two consecutive turns.

Card.Name: Tactician
Card.Description: Discard your hand. If you discarded any cards this way, then at the start of your next turn, +5 Cards; +1 Buy; and +1 Action.

Card.Name: Treasury
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Coin. When you discard this from play, if you didn't buy a Victory card this turn, you may put this on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Wharf
Card.Description: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards; +1 Buy.

Card.Name: Loan
Card.Description: Worth 1 Coin. When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discared it or trash it. Discard the other cards.

Card.Name: Trade Route
Card.Description: +1 Buy; +1 Coin per token on the Trade Route mat. Trash a card from your hand. Setup: Put a token on each Victory card Supply pile. When a card is gained from that pile, move the token to the Trade Route mat.

Card.Name: Watchtower
Card.Description: Draw until you have 6 cards in hand. When you gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, either trash that card, or put it on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Bishop
Card.Description: +1 Coin; +1 VP token. Trash a card from your hand. +VP tokens equal to half its cost in coins, rounded down. Each other player may trash a card from his hand.

Card.Name: Monument
Card.Description: +2 Coins. +1 VP token.

Card.Name: Quarry
Card.Description: Worth 1 Coin. While this is in play, Action cards cost 2 Coins less, but not less than 0 Coins

Card.Name: Talisman
Card.Description: Worth 1 Coin. While this is in play, when you buy a card costing 4 Coins or less that is not a Victory card, gain a copy of it.

Card.Name: Worker's Village
Card.Description: +1 Card; +2 Actions, +1 Buy

Card.Name: City
Card.Description: +1 Card; +2 Actions, +1 Buy

Card.Name: Contraband
Card.Description: Worth 3 Coins. +1 Buy. When you play this, the player to your left names a card. You can't buy that card this turn.

Card.Name: Counting House
Card.Description: Look through your discard pile, reveal any number of Copper cards from it, and put them into your hand.

Card.Name: Mint
Card.Description: You may reveal a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a copy of it. When you buy this, trash all Treasures you have in play.

Card.Name: Mountebank
Card.Description: +2 Coins. Each other player may discard a Curse. If he doesn't, he gains a Curse and a Copper.

Card.Name: Rabble
Card.Description: +3 Cards. Each other player reveals the top 3 cards of his deck, discards the revealed Actions and Treasures, and puts the rest back on top in any order he chooses.

Card.Name: Royal Seal
Card.Description: Worth 2 Coins. While this is in play, when you gain a card, you may put that card on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Vault
Card.Description: +2 Cards. Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded. Each other player may discard 2 cards. If he does, he draws a card.

Card.Name: Venture
Card.Description: Worth 1 Coin. When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard the other cards. Play that Treasure.

Card.Name: Goons
Card.Description: +1 Buy; +2 Coins. Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand. While this is in play, when you buy a card, +1 VP token.

Card.Name: Grand Market
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Actoin; +1 Buy; +2 Coins. You can't buy this if you have Copper in play.

Card.Name: Hoard
Card.Description: Worth 2 Coins. While this is in play, when you buy a Victory card, gain a Gold.

Card.Name: Bank
Card.Description: Worth Coins? When you play this, it's worth 1 Coin per Treasure card you have in play (counting this).

Card.Name: Expand
Card.Description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than the trashed card.

Card.Name: Forge
Card.Description: Trash any number of cards from your hand. Gain a card with cost exactly equal to the total cost in coins of the trashed cards.

Card.Name: King's Court
Card.Description: You may choose an Action card in your hand. Play it three times.

Card.Name: Peddler
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Action +1 Coin. During your Buy phase, this costs 2 Coins less per Action card you have in play, but not less than 0 Coins.

Card.Name: Platinum
Card.Description: Worth 5 Coins.

Card.Name: Colony
Card.Description: 10 Victory Points

Card.Name: Crossroads
Card.Description: Reveal your hand. +1 Card per Victory card revealed. If this is the first time you played a Crossroads this turn, +3 Actions.

Card.Name: Duchess
Card.Description: +2 Coins. Each player (including you) looks at the top card of his deck, and discards it or puts it back.

Card.Name: Fool's Gold
Card.Description: If this is the first time you played a Fool's Gold this turn, this is worth 1 Coin, Otherwise it's worth 4 Coins. When another player gains a Province, you may trash this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold, putting it on your deck.

Card.Name: Develop
Card.Description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it and a card costing exactly 1 Coin less than it, in either order, putting them on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Oasis
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Coin. Discard a card.

Card.Name: Oracle
Card.Description: Each player (including you) reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, and you choose: either he discards them, or he puts them back on top in an order he chooses. +2 Cards.

Card.Name: Scheme
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Action. At the start of Clean-up this turn, you may choose an Action card you have in play. If you discard it from play this turn, put it on your deck.

Card.Name: Tunnel
Card.Description: 2 Victory Points. When you discard this other than during a Clean-up phase, you may reveal it. If you do, gain a Gold.

Card.Name: Jack of All Trades
Card.Description: Gain a Silver. Look at the top card of your deck; discard it or put it back. Draw until you have 5 cards in hand. You may trash a card from your hand that is not a Treasure.

Card.Name: Noble Brigand
Card.Description: +1 Coin. When you buy this or play it, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Silver or Gold you choose, and discards the rest. If he didn't reveal a Treasure, he gains a Copper. You gain the trashed cards.

Card.Name: Nomad Camp
Card.Description: +1 Buy; +2 Coins. When you gain this, put it on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Silk Road
Card.Description: Worth 1 Victory Point for every 4 Victory cards in your deck (round down).

Card.Name: Spice Merchant
Card.Description: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. If you do, choose one: +2 Cards and +1 Action; or +2 Coins and +1 Buy.

Card.Name: Trader
Card.Description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a number of Silvers equal to its cost in coins. When you would gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, instead, gain a Silver.

Card.Name: Cache
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Action. Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.

Card.Name: Cartographer
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Action. Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.

Card.Name: Embassy
Card.Description: +5 Cards. Discards 3 cards. When you gain this, each other player gains a Silver.

Card.Name: Haggler
Card.Description: +2 Coins. While this is in play, when you buy a card, gain a card costing less than it that is not a Victory card.

Card.Name: Highway
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Action. While this is in play, cards cost 1 Coin less, but not less than 0 Coins.

Card.Name: Ill-Gotten Gains
Card.Description: Worth 1 Coin. When you play this, you may gain a Copper, putting it into your hand. When you gain this, each other player gains a Curse.

Card.Name: Inn
Card.Description: +2 Cards; +2 Actions. Discard 2 cards. When you gain this, look through your discard pile (including this), reveal any number of Action cards from it, and shuffle them into your deck.

Card.Name: Mandarin
Card.Description: +3 Coins. Put a card from your hand on top of your deck. When you gain this, put all Treasures you have in play on top of your deck in any order

Card.Name: Margrave
Card.Description: +3 Cards; +1 Buy. Each other player draws a card, then discards down to 3 cards in hand.

Card.Name: Stables
Card.Description: You may discard a Treasure. If you do, +3 Cards and +1 Action.

Card.Name: Border Village
Card.Description: +1 Card; +2 Actions. When you gain this, gain a card costing less than this.

Card.Name: Farmland
Card.Description: 2 VP. When you buy this, trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 2 Coins more than the trashed card.

Card.Name: Madman
Card.Description: +2 Actions. Return this to the Madman pile. If you do, +1 Card per card in your hand. (This is not in the Supply.)

Card.Name: Mercenary
Card.Description: You may trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, +2 Cards, +2 Coins, and each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand. (This is not in the Supply.)

Card.Name: Spoils
Card.Description: 3 Coins. When you play this, return it to the pile.

Card.Name: Poor House
Card.Description: +4 Coins. Reveal your hand. -1 Coin per Treasure card in your hand, to a minimum of 0 Coins.

Card.Name: Beggar
Card.Description: Gain 3 Coppers, putting them into your hand. When another player plays an Attack card, you may discard this. If you do, gain two Silvers, putting one on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Squire
Card.Description: +1 Coin. Choose one : +2 Actions; or +2 Buys; or gain a Silver. When you trash this, gain an Attack card.

Card.Name: Vagrant
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Action. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Victory card, Curse, Ruins, or Shelter, put it into your hand.

Card.Name: Forager
Card.Description: +1 Action; +1 Buy. Trash a card from your hand. +1 Coin per differently named Treasure in the trash.

Card.Name: Hermit
Card.Description: Look through your discard pile. You may trash a card that is not a Treasure, from your discard pile or your hand. Gain a card costing up to 3 Coins. When you discard this from play, if you didn't buy any cards this turn, trash this and gain a Madman (from the Madman pile).

Card.Name: Market Square
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Buy. When one of your cards is trashed, you may discard this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold.

Card.Name: Sage
Card.Description: +1 Action. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal one costing 3 Coins or more. Put that card into your hand and discard the rest.

Card.Name: Storeroom
Card.Description: +1 Buy. Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded. Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded the second time.

Card.Name: Urchin
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Action. Each other player discards down to 4 cards in hand. When you play another Attack card with this in play, you may trash this. If you do, gain a Mercenary from the Mercenary pile.

Card.Name: Armory
Card.Description: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins. Put it on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Death Cart
Card.Description: +5 Coins. You may trash an Action card form your hand. If you don't, trash this. When you gain this, gain two Ruins.

Card.Name: Feodum
Card.Description: Worth 1 VP for every 3 Silvers in your deck. When you trash this, gain 3 Silvers.

Card.Name: Fortress
Card.Description: +1 Card; +2 Actions. When you trash this, put it into your hand.

Card.Name: Ironmonger
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Action. Reveal the top card of your deck; you may discard it. If it is an Action card, +1 Action; a Treasure card, +1 Coin; a Victory card, +1 Card.

Card.Name: Marauder
Card.Description: Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile. Each other player gains a Ruins.

Card.Name: Procession
Card.Description: You may play an Action card form your hand twice. Trash it. Gain an Action card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.

Card.Name: Rats
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Action. Gain a Rats. Trash a card form your hand other than a Rats (or reveal a hand of all Rats).

Card.Name: Scavenger
Card.Description: You may put your deck into your discard pile. Look through your discard pile and put one card form it on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Wandering Minstrel
Card.Description: +1 Card; +2 Actions. Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put the Actions back on top in any order and discard the rest.

Card.Name: Band of Misfits
Card.Description: Play this as if it were an Aciton card in the Supply costing less than it that you choose. This is that card until it leaves play.

Card.Name: Bandit Camp
Card.Description: +1 Card; +2 Actions. Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile.

Card.Name: Catacombs
Card.Description: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Choose one: Put them into your hand; or discard them and +3 Card. When you trash this, gain a cheaper card.

Card.Name: Count
Card.Description: Choose one: Discard 2 cards; put a card from your hand on top of your deck; or gain a Copper. Choose one: +3 Coins; trash your hand; or gain a Duchy.

Card.Name: Counterfeit
Card.Description: +1 Coin; +1 Buy. When you play this, you may play a treasure from your hand twice. If you do, trash that treasure.

Card.Name: Cultist
Card.Description: +2 Cards. Each other player gains a Ruins. You may play a Cultist from your hand. When you trash this, +3 Cards.

Card.Name: Graverobber
Card.Description: Choose one: Gain a card form the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, putting it on top of your deck; or trash an Action card from your hand and gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than it.

Card.Name: Junk Dealer
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Coin. Trash a card from your hand.

Card.Name: Mystic
Card.Description: +1 Action. +2 Coins. Name a card. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put it into your hand.

Card.Name: Pillage
Card.Description: Trash this. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand reveals his hand and discards a card that you choose. Gain 2 Spoils.

Card.Name: Rebuild
Card.Description: +1 Action. Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Victory card this is not the named card. Discard the other cards. Trash the Victory card and gain a Victory card costing up to 3 coins more than it.

Card.Name: Rogue
Card.Description: +2 Coins. If there are any cards in the trash costing form 3 Coins to 6 Coins, gain one of them. Otherwise, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest.

Card.Name: Altar
Card.Description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins

Card.Name: Hunting Grounds
Card.Description: +4 Cards. When this is trashed, gain a Duchy or 3 Estates.

Card.Name: Ruins
Card.Description: 50 total, 10 or each type, shuffled into a pile of ten per opponent, like Curses.

Card.Name: Knights
Card.Description: One of each, all shuffled into one Kingdom pile.

Card.Name: Shelter
Card.Description: Replaces starting Estates

Card.Name: Herbalist
Card.Description: +1 Buy; +1 Coin. When you discard this from play, you may put one of your Treasures from play on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Potion
Card.Description: Worth one potion.

Card.Name: Apprentice
Card.Description: +1 Action. Trash a card from your hand. +1 Card per Coin it costs. +2 Cards if it has potion in its cost.

Card.Name: Transmute
Card.Description: Also costs one potion. Trash a card from your hand. If it is an. . . Action card, gain a Duchy; Treasure card, gain a Transmute; Victory card, gain a Gold.

Card.Name: Vineyard
Card.Description: Also costs one potion. Worth 1 Victory Point for every 3 Action cards in your deck (rounded down).

Card.Name: Apothecary
Card.Description: Also costs one potion. +1 Card; +1 Action. Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed COppers and Potions into your hand. Put the other cards back on top in any order.

Card.Name: Scrying Pool
Card.Description: Also costs one potion. +1 Action. Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice. Then reveal cards from the top of your deck until revealing one that isn't an Action. Put all of your revealed cards into your hand.

Card.Name: University
Card.Description: Also costs one potion. +2 Actions. You may gain an Action card costing up to 5 Coins.

Card.Name: Alchemist
Card.Description: Also costs one potion. +2 Cards; +1 Action. When you discard this from play you may put htis on top of your deck if you have a Potion in play.

Card.Name: Familiar
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Action. Each other player gains a Curse.

Card.Name: Philosopher's Stone
Card.Description: Also costs one potion. When you play this, count your deck and discard pile. Worth 1 Coin per 5 cards total between them (rounded down).

Card.Name: Golem
Card.Description: Also costs one potion. Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Action cards other than Golem Cards. Discard the other cards, then play the Action cards in either order.

Card.Name: Possession
Card.Description: Also costs one potion. The player to your left takes an extra turn after this one, in which you can see all cards he can and make all decisions for him. Any cards he would gain on that turn, you gain instead; any cards of his that are trashed are set aside and returned to his discard pile at end of turn.

Card.Name: Hamlet
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Action. You may discard a card; if you do, +1 Action. You may discard a card; if you do, +1 Buy.

Card.Name: Fortune Teller
Card.Description: +2 Coins. Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until he reveals a Victory or Curse card. He puts it on top and discards the other revealed cards.

Card.Name: Menagerie
Card.Description: +1 Action. Reveal your hand. If there are no duplicate cards in it, +3 Cards. Otherwise, +1 Card.

Card.Name: Farming Village
Card.Description: +2 Actions. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal an Action or Treasure card. Put that card into your hand and discard the other cards.

Card.Name: Horse Traders
Card.Description: +1 Buy; +3 Coins; Discard 2 cards. When another player plays an Attack card, you may set this aside from your hand. If you do, then at the start of your next turn, +1 Card and return this to your hand.

Card.Name: Remake
Card.Description: Do this twice: Trash a card from your hand; gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than the trashed card.

Card.Name: Tournament
Card.Description: +1 Action. Each player may reveal a Province from his hand. If you do, discard it and gain a Prize (from the Prize pile) or a Duchy, putting it on top of your deck. If no-one else does, +1 Card, +1 Coin.

Card.Name: Young Witch
Card.Description: +2 Cards. Discard 2 cards. Each other player may reveal a Bane card from his hand. If he doesn't, he gains a Curse. Setup: Add an extra Kingdom card pile costing 2 Coins or 3 Coins to the Supply. Cards from that pile are Bane cards.

Card.Name: Harvest
Card.Description: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck, then discard them. +1 Coin per differently named card revealed.

Card.Name: Horn of Plenty
Card.Description: Worth 0 Coins. When you play this, gain a card costing up to 1 Coin per differently named card you have in play, counting this. If it's a Victory card, trash this.

Card.Name: Haunting Party
Card.Description: +1 Card; +1 Action. Reveal your hand. Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a card that isn't a duplicate of one in your hand. Put it into your hand and diiscard the rest.

Card.Name: Jester
Card.Description: +2 Coins. Each other player discards the top card of his deck. If it's a Victory card he gains a Curse. Otherwise either he gains a copy of the discarded card or you do, your choice.

Card.Name: Fairgrounds
Card.Description: Worth 2 Victory Points for every 5 differently named cards in your deck (round down).

Card.Name: Bag of Gold
Card.Description: +1 Action. Gain a Gold, putting it on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Diadem
Card.Description: Worth 2 Coins. When you play this, +1 Coin per unused Action you have (Action, not Action card).

Card.Name: Followers
Card.Description: +2 Cards. Gain an Estate. Each other player gains a Curse and discards down to 3 cards in hand.

Card.Name: Princess
Card.Description: +1 Buy. While this is in play, cards cost 2 Coins less, but not less than 0 Coins.

Card.Name: Trusy Steed
Card.Description: Choose two: +2 Cards; or +2 Actions; or +2; or gain 4 Silvers and put your deck into your discard.

Card.Name: Candlestick Maker
Card.Description: +1 Action. +1 Buy. Take a Coin token.

Card.Name: Stonemason
Card.Description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain 2 cards each costing less than it. When you buy this, you may overpay for it. If you do, gain 2 action cards each costing the amount you overpaid.

Card.Name: Doctor
Card.Description: Name a card. Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash the matches. Put the rest back on top in any order.

Card.Name: Masterpiece
Card.Description: Worth 1 Coin. When you buy this, you may overpay for it. If you gain a Silver per 1 Coin you overpaid.

Card.Name: Advisor
Card.Description: +1 Action. Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one of them. Discard that card. Put the other cards into your hand.

Card.Name: Herald
Card.Description: +1 Card. +1 Action. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an Action, play it. When you buy this, you may overpay for it. For each 1 Coin you overpaid, look through your discard pile and put a card from it on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Plaza
Card.Description: +1 Card. +2 Actions. You may discard a Treasure card. If you do, take a Coin token.

Card.Name: Taxman
Card.Description: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand discards a copy of it (or reveals a hand without it). Gain a Treasure card costing up to 3 Coins more than the trashed card, putting it on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Baker
Card.Description: +1 Card. +1 Action. Take a Coin token. Setup: Each player takes a Coin token.

Card.Name: Butcher
Card.Description: Take 2 Coin tokens. You may trash a card from your hand and the pay any number of Coin tokens. If you did trash a card, gain a card with a cost of up to the cost of the trashed card plus the number of Coin tokens you paid.

Card.Name: Journeyman
Card.Description: Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 3 cards that are not the named card. Put those cards into your hand and discard the rest.

Card.Name: Merchant Guild
Card.Description: +1 Buy. +1 Coin. While this is in play, when you buy a card, take a Coin token.

Card.Name: Soothsayer
Card.Description: Gain a Gold. Each other player gains a Curse. Each player who did draws a card.

Card.Name: Black Market
Card.Description: +2 Coins. Reveal the top 3 cards of the Black Market deck. You may buy one of them immediately. Put the unbought cards on the bottom of the Black Market deck in any order. Before the game, make a Black Market deck out of one copy of each Kingdom card not in the supply.

Card.Name: Envoy
Card.Description: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one for you to discard. Draw the rest.

Card.Name: Walled Village
Card.Description: +1 Card; +2 Actions. At the start of Clean-up, if you have this and no more than one other Action card in play, you may put this on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Governor
Card.Description: +1 Action. Choose one; you get the version in parentheses: Each player gets +1 (+3) Cards; or each player gain a Silver (Gold); or each player may trash a card form his hand and gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin (2 Coins) more.

Card.Name: Stash
Card.Description: Worth 2 Coins. When you shuffle, you may put this anywhere in your deck.

Card.Name: Prince
Card.Description: You may set this aside. If you do, set aside an Action card from your hand costing up to 4 Coins. At the start of each of your turns, play that Action, setting it aside again when you discard it from play. (Stop playing it if your fail to set it aside on a turn you play it.)
